Hillary Clinton: s claim about the number of mass shootings in the United States in the last year was false.
There is wide disagreement on how mass s: with different criteria used by different sources.
The Gun Violence Archive: which includes gang shootings and home invasion robberies, counted 19 shootings where four or more people were killed.
Mother Jones: a liberal magazine, only identified three mass shootings that meet the criteria of four or more people killed.
